Description: TL12 Expandable leather wheeled travel bag, 'Style Traveler' Delivery by Father's Day (June 19th) guaranteed with EXPEDITED shipping ($25.00) if payment received by 6/8/2017 Look below for more details about our shipping guarantee Expert in leather accessories, Brazil's João Carlos Silva designs a versatile travel bag that can be expanded in length when desired. Zippers regulate the size of the bag, which travels on five wheels. Silva works with leather of the highest quality, selecting dark espresso brown for this suitcase. The travel bag features two external pockets, a fully lined interior, and sturdy handles as well as an adjustable shoulder strap. Artist: João Carlos Silva MORE FROM THIS ARTIST Item Details Size Bag: 15.8 inches H x 16.5 inches W x 11.0 inches D Expanded bag: 27.5 inches H x 16.5 inches W x 11.0 inches D Handle: 21.3 inches L x 1.2 inches W Handle drop length: 7.0 inches from strap to bag Strap: 39.0 inches min L - x 48.0 inches max L x 1.2 inches W Strap drop length: 9.8 inches min L - x 15.0 inches max L Weight 4.83 pounds Materials Leather with brass fixtures. Nylon lining Additional Info Features a zipper closure Adjustable strap(s) Genuine leather may naturally show subtle marks, scratches or wrinkles Photos are representative of the item being offered, but are not necessarily of the exact item you would receive. Biography of João Carlos Silva "Thinking back to my childhood days, I realized that crafting leather goods has always been present in my life. My uncles produced all sorts of leather… as well as musical instruments…." "In 1975, fate dealt me a lucky hand and I became an artisan.
